name: paymentAuthorizationController(_:didSelectPaymentMethod:handler:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user changed the payment method, and asks for an updated payment request.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationController, 
                      didSelectPaymentMethod paymentMethod: PKPaymentMethod, 
                                     handler completion: @escaping (PKPaymentRequestPaymentMethodUpdate) -> Void)
